mapper.select: SELECT t.id account_id, t.account, t.first_user_type account_type, IF(t.first_user_type = 1, t2.avatar, t1.avatar) avatar, IF(t.first_user_type = 1, t2.nick_name, t1.nick_name) nick_name, IF(t.first_user_type = 1, t2.gender, t1.gender) gender, t3.store_id, t3.store_name FROM t_account t LEFT JOIN t_user t1 ON t.id = t1.account_id AND t1.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_user_alipay t2 ON t.id = t2.account_id AND t2.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_store_user t3 ON t.id = t3.account_id AND t3.is_delete = 0 WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.account = #{account} AND t.`password` = #{password}
